translations: （使）高兴，开心（rejoice 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He rejoiced in the name of Owen Owen.
sentences.translation: 他有个滑稽的名字叫欧文•欧文。

sentences.sentence: They rejoiced to see their son well again.
sentences.translation: 他们看到儿子恢复了健康，无比高兴。

sentences.sentence: Party activists in New Hampshire rejoiced that the presidential campaign had finally started.
sentences.translation: 新罕布什尔州的党派积极分子们为总统竞选活动终于开始而欣喜。
